OUTLINE : Patients sequentially enrol 1 2 group . Group 1 enrol month 4-21 group 2 month 25-54 . - Group 1 ( usual care ) : Patient questionnaire administer baseline 3 6 month . The clinician ' satisfaction care also evaluate . - Group 2 ( advanced practice nurse [ APN ] intervention ) : Patients accrue APN . Patients meet APN periodically assess physical well-being include ambulatory care need , care physical symptom ( i.e. , pain , fatigue , nausea vomit ) , psychological well-being . Questionnaires administer baseline 3 6 month . In group , questionnaire include FACT-Hep , Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale , Psychological Distress Thermometer , Comprehensive Geriatric Assessment , Patient Satisfaction Intervention . Clinicians also complete questionnaire . Patients ' medical chart also review .
